alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 3:08PM AKST until December 26 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring, with freezing rain expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Snow accumulations of 10 inches, and ice accumulations of between one tenth and one quarter inch are expected. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until 9 AM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
